DOC.brief_summary: This research trial study germ-line mutation blood saliva sample patient cancer . Studying sample blood saliva patient cancer laboratory may help doctor learn inherit genetic mutation affect cancer predisposition ( inherited increase risk develop cancer ) , impact treatment response , role cancer development .
DOC.brief_title: Germ-Line Mutations Blood Saliva Samples From Patients With Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To collect germ-line deoxyribonucleic acid ( DNA ) nucleic acid cancer patient investigate association identify new germ-line mutation impact cancer predisposition . II . To investigate role germ-line mutation predict cancer outcome response therapy . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To determine effect identify variant tumor micro-ribonucleic acid ( miRNA ) , protein gene expression . II . To study expression DNA , ribonucleic acid ( RNA ) protein blood cancer patient without variant interest discover correlation level presence cancer and/or response therapy patient . OUTLINE : Patients undergo collection blood saliva sample 1-3 time discretion investigator germ-line mutation analysis . After completion study , patient follow 5 year .
DOC.criteria: Pathologically clinical confirm tissue diagnosis cancer Ability understand willingness sign write informed consent Patients exclude cancer confirm Refusal sign inform consent
